title: i am having resolution problems
body: i software updated my pc and now i bugsplat after champselect i believe its my resolution  ive tried to change the hight and width in the game.cfg but i cannot find a resolution that completely covers and is not stretched in fullscreen pls help my skype is : --snip-- please add me and give me info on what to do (i already have a support ticket that riot is taking forever to respond to)

replies.body: I snipped out your skype info to protect your privacy.  it sounds like you may be having a combination of issues here, including potentially bad game files and outdated drivers.  I suggest using our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to tune up your PC and get your settings up to date.  This should get you in the clear!
